divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving along phenoix headed to Zero street saw a large glowing object in the sky orange i stopped in the road point while we were watching the object got brighter and two more ORANGE objects appeared got bright then disappeared.
Summary: Looked like a star brightened up two more appear then they all disappeared
